name: Chase of the Ruby
description:
The Skylands of Hershia, a world divided into two parts: Commoners, the ones who are trying to make a living to merely survive and Elites, the ones who are in possession of superpowers. 

For Rosalie, a 23-year-old commoner residing in the poorest parts of Hershia, life was anything but fair. That is until she decides to take matters into her own hands and plots to steal the most powerful jewel of the kingdom, the ruby of Hershia. 

What are the consequences of a 23-year-old woman robbing the holy ruby of the skylands? Find out as she falls through an apparent eternal abyss.

This is a submission for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.
